short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open popups as tabs! With whitelist support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can make google chrome open popups as tabs. The extension uses whitelists to determine which sites it is active on. Some existing extensions open popups as tabs but they cannot be controlled using whitelists.
